Articles.Content:
I\'m not too new to the game, i have about 20hrs+ sunk in already. I am, however, new to the forums so i figured i would introduce myself.

I go by the screen name PD and have a lot of work on YouTube here at www.youtube.com/xpdxtv . Go check it out, i have over 100 videos including some of KSP.

I started by playing the KSP demo and after about a half hour decided i just had to donate to get access to the newest version as well as help the devs.

Anyways that\'s about it, thanks for reading.

PD

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Hi xPDxTV, I am subscribed to you on YouTube and your 'Lets look at' introduced me to this game. Which I have fallen in love with and since gotten two of my friends in love with it. Thank you. ;D

Hi xPDxTV, I am subscribed to you on YouTube and your 'Lets look at' introduced me to this game. Which I have fallen in love with and since gotten two of my friends in love with it. Thank you. ;D

I\'m very glad that my videos are already attracting people to this amazing in development space sim / sandbox style game that is KSP =)

The devs at Squad definitely had a great idea as rocketeers of all ages have been waiting for a game of this caliber for quite a long time!

I don\'t mean to be an ass, but PD in France means Homo. :/

Bleh, anyway Ima watch your videos you seem like a cool guy
Oh, and I\'m guessing PD are the initials of something. Is it a secret nickname or your real name?
You just got a new sub

I don\'t mean to be an ass, but PD in France means Homo. :/

Well I\'m glad i do not live in france or my name may be mistaken by quite a few people xD

I honestly had no idea this was the case, as i live in North America i don\'t quite get exposure to European Cultures

Oh, and I\'m guessing PD are the initials of something. Is it a secret nickname or your real name?

Yes they are initials =) Not to my real name but as part of an old screen name i used to use on the competitive SC Broodwar ladder.

Ahh, those childhood memories of crushing my foes and being crushed by those better than me .. (Falls off into a day dream)

And thanks very much for the sub, i have quite a bit of work that i do and try to upload content daily! I already have episode 3 recorded for my KSP series and that will be released tomorrow sometime early CST.

Hey everyone, just throwing an update for anyone reading this thread still, I\'ll be doing a special on YouTube. A marathon running from July 16th - July 21st on Kerbal Space Program in honor of the anniversary of Apollo 11, hope to see you all there!

Link to my Page in the first post!

Hey everyone, just throwing an update for anyone reading this thread still, I\'ll be doing a special on YouTube. A marathon running from July 16th - July 21st on Kerbal Space Program in honor of the anniversary of Apollo 11, hope to see you all there!

Link to my Page in the first post!

Awesome stuff! I\'ll be there

Here is the thread in which you can find the embedded videos (in general discussion) in case you don\'t feel like traveling all the way to YouTube. =)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16182.0
